text: whw subhanah aldhy yaqbid arwahkm biallayl bima yushbih qbdha eind almwt, wayaelam ma aktsbtm fi alnahar min alaemal, thuma yueid arwahkm 'iilaa ajsamkm balyqzt min alnwm nharana bima yushbih al'ahya' baed almwt; ltuqda ajalkm almuhadadat fi aldnya, thuma 'iilaa allah taealaa meadkm baed baethukum min qbwrkm ahya'an, thuma ykhbrkm bima kuntum taemalun fi hayatikum aldnya, thuma yjazykm bdhlk
